author: Source: Halesowennews.co.uk
title: Is the BBC about to make an All-Star version of The Apprentice? - Halesowennews.co.uk
text:
Last year's winner, Mark Wright, said he would love to go back to the BBC series "in some capacity" - and revealed that plans was already in the works for all the Apprentice champions to make a comeback. He told Digital Spy: "I shouldn't say this, but there is talk of all of the winners going back and having a best Apprentice of all the people that have won, because there's now going to be 11 there [after this series].
Start the conversation, or Read more at Halesowennews.co.uk.
